Serialized Form

Class SortAlgDemo.BarChartPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

c

java.lang.Comparable[] c
A private array of Comparable object, the data container which store the data being sorted.

comparisonCount

int comparisonCount
A private integer which holds the total number comparison occured in the sorting

swapCount

int swapCount
A private integer which holds the total number of data swapping occured in the sorting

barWidth

int barWidth
A private final integer which presets the width of each bar in the bar chart of 5, this value can't be modified.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

Class SortAlgDemo.SortVisualizer extends javax.swing.JApplet implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

jpTop

javax.swing.JPanel jpTop
A private JPanel which is the upper portion of the GUI.

jpMain

javax.swing.JPanel jpMain
A private JPanel which is the main portion of the GUI.

jpConfig

javax.swing.JPanel jpConfig
A private JPanel which is the portion of the GUI that display current configuration.

jpMain_center

javax.swing.JPanel jpMain_center
A private JPanel which is the portion of the GUI that display the sorting process.

jcbSortAlg

javax.swing.JComboBox jcbSortAlg
A private JComboBox which allow user to select the preferred sorting algorithm.

jcbDataNo

javax.swing.JComboBox jcbDataNo
A private JComboBox which allow user to select the preferred number of data being sorted.

jcbInitOrder

javax.swing.JComboBox jcbInitOrder
A private JComboBox which allow user to select the preferred initial ordering of data being sorted.

jcbSortSpeed

javax.swing.JComboBox jcbSortSpeed
A private JComboBox which allow user to select the preferred sorting speed.

jbtnConfig

javax.swing.JButton jbtnConfig
A private JButton which will open the configuration menu when user click on it.

jbtnHelp

javax.swing.JButton jbtnHelp
A private JButton which will open the help menu when user click on it.

jbtnAPI

javax.swing.JButton jbtnAPI
A private JButton which will open the API menu when user click on it.

jbtnStop

javax.swing.JButton jbtnStop
A private JButton which will terminate the current sorting operation when user click on it.

jbtnPause

javax.swing.JButton jbtnPause
A private JButton which will pause the current sorting operation when user click on it.

jbtnSetConfig

javax.swing.JButton jbtnSetConfig
A private JButton which will start the sorting operation with the selected config when user click on it.

jlbCurrentConfig

javax.swing.JLabel jlbCurrentConfig
A private JLabel which will display the current config.

jlbSystemMsg

javax.swing.JLabel jlbSystemMsg
A private JLabel which will display the system message.

jdgConfig

javax.swing.JDialog jdgConfig
A private JDialog which holds the configuration menu.

appName

java.lang.String appName
A private String which display the software name.

appDesc

java.lang.String appDesc
A private String which display the software description.

sortingAlg

int sortingAlg
A private integer which indicate the selected sorting algorithm.
0 - Insertion Sort
1 - Shell Sort
2 - Quick Sort
3 - Merge Sort

sortingDataNo

int sortingDataNo
A private integer which indicate the selected number of data being sorted.

sortingOrder

int sortingOrder
A private integer which indicate the selected initial ordering of data being sorted.
0 - Increasing Order
1 - Decreasing Order
2 - Random Order
3 - Nearly Sorted

sortingSpeed

int sortingSpeed
A private integer which indicate the selected sorting speed.
0 - Step
1 - Slow
2 - Medium
3 - Fast

st

SortTimer st
A private SortTimer object.
